date: Mon, 11 Jun 2018 10:25:10 +0000
draft: false
---

\[vc\_row\]\[vc\_column width="1/2"\]\[vc\_raw\_html\]\[/vc\_raw\_html\]\[vc\_column\_text css=".vc\_custom\_1528712818365{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"\]My name is Pry S. I am a writer, web developer and IT enthusiast. I graduated from IISIP Jakarta (2008) with major interest in writing/ blogging, programming and technology. I have **+8 years** working experience as a writer, programmer, and IT System Administrator at various companies in Indonesia.

My career started at early 2000 as a **Writer/ Journalist** at various independent and national mass media in Jakarta, Bekasi and Bogor. At 2009, I was chosen as a participant **Bloggers** at workshop held by Voice of Human Rights (VHR) News Centre.

In the same year, I moved to settle in Bandung and join at Nusa Cipta Teknologi (Encity) as **Junior Web Programmer** in 2010. One year later, Encity promoted me as **IT System Administrator** to assist our client equalBright Education until 2014.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[vc\_column\_text css=".vc\_custom\_1528279746215{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"\]Since then, I have worked as a **Web Developer** for various client, company and non-profit organization in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore and Hongkong.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column width="1/2"\]\[vc\_column\_text el\_class="picdesktop"\]

![](https://www.pryspry.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/DSC_3255-e1528278635780-1024x685.jpg)
